articles.title: FM Spokesman on U.S. Return of DPRK's Diplomatic Package
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on U.S. Return of DPRK's Diplomatic Package
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) gave the following answer to the question raised by the KCNA on July 18 as regards the fact that the U.S. made an apology and returned the diplomatic package to the DPRK which it had seized from a DPRK delegation in New York:
					 As reported, on June 16, the delegation of the DPRK which was en route home after attending the Conference of States Parties to the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities was literally mugged at the John F. Kennedy International Airport by the U.S. authorities that forcibly took away a diplomatic package from the delegation in an illegal and heinous act of provocation.
					
					 The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK termed this mugging by the U.S. an intolerable act of infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and a malicious provocation, and condemned it in the strongest terms while strongly demanding an explanation and an official apology from the U.S. government.
					
					 At the meeting of the UN Committee on Relations with Host Country, convened at the request of the permanent mission of the DPRK to the UN, the Cyprian representative chairing the committee and other representatives from many countries attending the session including China, Russia, Cuba and Syria acknowledged the mugging of the diplomatic package as a grave infringement upon the sovereignty of a UN member state which can never be tolerated.
					
					 The U.S. Department of State made an official apology to the DPRK on behalf of the U.S. government acknowledging that its security officials concerned made a mistake and expressed its hope that the DPRK would understand that the mistake was due to the security officials being oversensitive amid the deteriorating security situation in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. eventually returned the diplomatic package and all its contents to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should learn a due lesson from the incident and never again commit such an act of infringing the sovereignty of other countries, in flagrant violation of the universally recognized international norms and regulations.

articles.title: U.S. "Sanctions" Branded as Acts against Humanity and Civilization
articles.content:
U.S. "Sanctions" Branded as Acts against Humanity and Civilization
Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK minister of Physical Culture and Sports attended the 6th meeting of sports ministers held in Russia from July 13 to 15 as head of the DPRK delegation.
					 Speaking there, he said that it is the policy of the DPRK government and desire of its people to promote physical culture of people, develop the country's sports and build sports powerhouse and a highly civilized power.
					
					 The sports activities in the DPRK have faced difficulties due to the UN unwarranted sanctions measures at the manipulation of the U.S., he said, and went on:
					
					 The hostile forces including the U.S. enforced illegal "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK at the UN Security Council since 2006. They coercively adopted "resolution" 2270 in March 2016 and added luxury items to sanctions item list, even popular sports apparatuses.
					
					 Some countries are disallowing the sale of such sports apparatuses as ski, ice hockey clubs, mountaineering boots, game guns and bullets, and game bows and arrows and are preventing the delivery of sports apparatuses offered free by the international sports associations, under the pretexts of implementing the UN Security Council's "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK.
					
					 They are creating deliberate obstacles in the DPRK's participation in international games and sports events as evidenced by non-approval of visas for DPRK sports teams and members of the DPRK delegations.
					
					 Such abnormal situation helps the world clearly understand that sanctions are savage acts against humanity and civilization as they would not only destroy modern civilization but aim to revert the world to the medieval dark era.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK government would as ever closely cooperate with international organizations and many countries of the world to abide by the Olympic Charter and to make sure that sports activities in the DPRK contribute to the sustainable development and peace of the world in compliance with the declarations and resolutions adopted at meetings of the sports ministers.

articles.title: Mozambican Party Leader on Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Mozambican Party Leader on Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea who is leading its delegation on a visit to Mozambique, had a talk with Eliseu Joaquim Machava, secretary general of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party.
					 The secretary general referred to the friendly relations between the two parties with a long-standing tradition.
					
					 The Mozambique people always remember the sincere assistance given by President Kim Il Sung to the struggle for the independence of their country and are thankful for it, he said.
					
					 He expressed full support to the Korean people's struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country, stressing that the cause of the WPK guided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un would surely triumph.
					
					 He declared that the MLFP and the Mozambican people would value and invariably develop the relations of friendship between the two parties and two countries.

articles.title: Russian Government Donates Food to DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Government Donates Food to DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Food, donated by the Russian government to the DPRK through WFP, arrived at Chongjin Port of the DPRK on July 16.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Arranges Friendly Gathering
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Arranges Friendly Gathering
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a friendly gathering on Tuesday to mark the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation.
					 Present on invitation were officials of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 The participants talked about the need to further strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations in line with common desire of the peoples of the two countries, recalling Kim Jong Il's feats for the development of the bilateral friendly ties.
					
					 They had colorful sports games.

articles.title: 15th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Opens
articles.content:
15th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies Opens
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The 15th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday.
					 Exhibited there are over 1,500 inventions and new technological achievements made by scientists, engineers, officials and inventors across the country.
					
					 Among the exhibits, presented by ministries and national institutions, Pyongyang and provinces, are achievements conducive to the development of the national economy and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					 A scientific and technological presentation, intellectual product sale, etc. are to be held during the exhibition.
					
					 Attending the opening-ceremony were Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and others.

articles.title: Program "Yusan 1.0" Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Program "Yusan 1.0" Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University has recently developed a program "Yusan (Heritage) 1.0" for perusing "Tonguibogam", an encyclopedic medical classics which deals with achievements made till the 16th century in developing the Koryo medicine.
					 Stored in its database are at least one million Chinese characters from original texts with their Korean version in five volumes, over 3,000 Koryo medical terms, data on 1,000-odd Koryo medicines and scanned original "Tonguibogam" amounting to thousands of image files together with a dictionary of 10,000 Chinese characters.
					
					 The program will be helpful to ensuring scientific accuracy and quickness in the research into Koryo medicine and putting into practice the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on combining modern medicine with Koryo medicine.

articles.title: Koguryo's Excellent Architecture
articles.content:
Superior Architecture of Koguryo
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- There are many historical relics showing the excellent architecture of Koguryo (B.C. 277-A.D. 668), a powerful state that existed in the East for a thousand years.
					 Typical of them are Thaewang and Janggun tombs.
					
					 30,000 cubic meters of stone were used in the construction of Thaewang tomb. Over 2,430 square meters of its surface and 78 square meters of chamber are covered with trimmed stones.
					
					 Janggun tomb is 34 meters long and wide and 13 meters high with 7 layers piled up with well-trimmed rectangular granites. Huge granites were placed at its base and each of them is one meter wide and high and 6 meters long.
					
					 Those tombs, believed to be built 1700 years ago, still keep their original appearances.
					
					 Masonry was also developed in the period of Koguryo. 
					
					 It can be well evidenced by the mausoleum of Kogukwon (A.D. 331-371), the 21st king of Koguryo, and three tombs in Kangso.
					
					 Every well-trimmed stone fits together with no slightest gap in the chamber of the mausoleum which was built in the mid-4th century, and no deformation has been observed from joints of walls, ceiling compage, etc. in chambers of three tombs in Kangso.
					
					 Different artistic skills like mural paintings in the big and medium tombs in Kangso, world-known masterpieces, were applied to decorate inner walls of tombs in the period of Koguryo.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Transfer of U.S. 8th Army Command in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Transfer of U.S. 8th Army Command in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the U.S. and south Korean puppet army transferred the Command of the U.S. 8th Army present in south Korea to the area of Phyongthaek, Kyonggi Province, before holding an "opening ceremony of new building".
					 The commander of the 8th Army in his "welcoming speech" praised the south Korean lackeys, terming the move an "event demonstrating the solid south Korea-U.S. alliance". He added that the transfer of the U.S. base would improve the defense capability and combat preparedness of the U.S. forces.
					
					 The transfer, related with the attempt to perpetuate the U.S. military presence in south Korea, is a revelation of the foolish intention to save its troops only in the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 The goal of the U.S. Asia policy is to occupy the whole of Korea with south Korea as a stepping stone and realize the ambition for world domination.
					
					 Accordingly, the U.S. forced the Korean nation to suffer the most miserable disaster of the Korean War in the 1950s. And it has imposed upon the nation all sorts of misfortunes and sufferings for several decades.
					
					 Far from drawing a due lesson from the Korean War in which the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. was shattered as it misjudged its rival in the beginning, the U.S. has stationed its troops in Ryongsan of Seoul and different parts of south Korea and staged various drills of war against the DPRK.
					
					 Frightened by the tremendous might of the Korean People's Army rapidly strengthening these days, the U.S. chose the best way to move its aggressor forces bases in south Korea to the areas south of the River Han. 
					
					 It is the American style way of existence to save its own destiny without caring about its face as superpower. This vividly showed what the "solid south Korea-U.S. alliance" is.
					
					 The situation of the empire declining to the downward can never change by transferring its military bases now.
					
					 It is very easy to wipe out the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and south Korean puppet army under the very nose of us as we are all prepared to make the U.S. mainland into ashes.
					
					 It is very ridiculous for the U.S. to advertise that the U.S. base in Phyongthaek is the biggest overseas U.S. military base in the world.
					
					 The bigger target will further improve hit-rates and fire-influence. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers can never escape from the sight of the DPRK as they are hell bent on the confrontation racket devoting the worthwhile place and big taxes from the south Korean people to the U.S., which is aiming at annihilating the Korean nation.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs can never be safe under the sky no matter whether they are located in Ryongsan and Phyongthaek or in the U.S. mainland.

articles.title: Nobody Can Check Advance of Great Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nobody Can Check Advance of Great Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The great success in the test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 proves once again the truth that nothing can check the advance of the great Paektusan nation dashing ahead like storm in defiance of all the ordeals and challenges of history, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 The U.S. should know that Korea does what it is determined to do and the might of the DPRK is irresistible, the article states, and goes on:
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could threaten the DPRK and the DPRK-U.S. confrontation structure totally changed. The U.S., which used to force all other countries to yield to it, styling itself as "absolute monarch" in our planet, can not but kneel down before the DPRK.
					
					 However, turning blind eyes to this stark reality, the U.S. and south Korean warmongers are getting evermore desperate in the anti-DPRK sanctions and nuclear war moves to curb the DPRK's bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. makes efforts to stifle the DPRK, the stronger our faith in the final victory is getting.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean war maniacs challenge the DPRK at any cost, the army and people of the DPRK will display the invincible power to the full with bitter hostility toward the U.S. and victorious conclude the centuries-long standoff with the U.S.

articles.title: U.S. Aggression Forces in S. Korea Is Primary Target of KPA Strike: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Aggression Forces in S. Korea Is Primary Target of KPA Strike: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. 8th Army Command present in south Korea was transferred from Ryongsan of Seoul into Phyongthaek of Kyonggi Province.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary slams the transfer of the U.S. military base as a vicious challenge to the desire of all Koreans to live in harmony in a reunified country as it was motivated by the U.S. imperialist aggressors' scenario for permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 Their sinister intention is to ignite a war against the north at any cost by reducing the south Korean puppet army into cannon fodder and fanning up the military confrontation between the north and the south, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The U.S. military base, the root cause of disaster of the south Korean people, should not be transferred but removed.
					
					 The U.S. calculates that its choice of Phyongthaek in the coastal area as a new base of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea is good to massively deploy armed forces through it in contingency and rapidly evacuate it when the situation turns unfavorable.
					
					 But this is miscalculation. If the U.S. calculates it can reduce its losses when it takes its aggression forces into the area south of the River Han and prepares to take flight, this is a foolish daydream.
					
					 The provocateurs and aggressors can never escape the mercilessly annihilating strikes within the sight of powerful revolutionary Paektusan army no matter where they are located and the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea will be the primary target of the Korean People's Army's strikes once it opens fire.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flails War Drills by U.S., S. Korean Marines
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flails War Drills by U.S., S. Korean Marines
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet marines recently staged DPRK-targeted war games with marines of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in Phohang of North Kyongsang Province under the pretext of improving the capabilities for carrying out combined operation.
					 They also conducted a combined ballistic missile muscle-flexing with the U.S. on the east coast of Korea.
					
					 In this regard, Minju Joson in a commentary says Tuesday it is nothing but a reckless and foolish act of those frightened at the tremendous power and the strategic position of the DPRK which have been put on a new higher level.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Trump administration is running helter-skelter after getting "gift package" from the DPRK.
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet forces dared to stage such war drills, not knowing how uneasy their American master feel. This clearly shows that the south Korean warmongers remain unchanged in their scheme for confrontation with the fellow countrymen and invasion of the north.
					
					 Both the U.S. and south Korean trigger-happy forces can never escape from the retaliatory strikes by the DPRK.
					
					 If they show the slightest provocation to the DPRK, its invincible revolutionary army will reduce to ashes the fortresses of the aggressors, provocateurs, whether they are close to it or far from it, by the most merciless and thorough scorched-earth operation of Korean style.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Understand Strategic Position of DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Understand Strategic Position of DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK sent a big "gift" to the U.S. on its "independence day" on July 4.
					 Even at this critical moment, the U.S. is not awakened from a pipe dream that intensified sanctions and pressure would make the DPRK yield, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					
					 The U.S. is still unaware of its rival although it sustained such bitter defeats in the stand-off with the DPRK. Herein lies the biggest tragedy of the U.S., the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. authorities regard human beings as money slaves and seeker of financial interests only and, therefore, can never understand the mental power of the army and people of the DPRK defending their ideology, social system and faith despite the worst difficulties, and their might of single-minded unity around the illustrious commander.
					
					 The DPRK is now in a position to lead the U.S., styling itself the world's "only super power", by the nose. Should the U.S. continue to opt for stand-off with the DPRK, unaware of the meaning of the "gift" delivered to it on its "independence day", we will continue to send "gift packages", big or small, to tire it out.
					
					 If the U.S. does not want to suffer the same defeat and shame as what it faced on July 4, it should clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK, approach it with dignity and make a bold decision to make a switchover in the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea: Mail Deliverymen Stage Struggle for Vital Rights
articles.content:
S. Korea: Mail Deliverymen Stage Struggle for Vital Rights
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Mail deliverymen of south Korea staged a struggle to defend their right to existence in Seoul on July 14 under the sponsorship of the Mail Trade Unions, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 A rally was held to adopt an appeal, which said that the mail authorities forced deliverymen to conduct murderous labor free of charge and heavy labor for long hours while talking about profits.
					
					 At the end of the rally, the participants marched to the vicinity of Chongwadae.

articles.title: Complete Withdrawal of U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Complete Withdrawal of U.S. Military Base Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean Yonhap News, the all-citizens measure committee for relocation of the U.S. forces issued a statement at the Tongtuchon City Office on July 14.
					 The statement charged the U.S. imperialist aggressors decided to keep their 210th artillery brigade in the city till 2020, though the brigade was to be completely withdrawn last year.

articles.title: Frauds Exposed in S. Korean Munitions Business
articles.content:
Frauds Exposed in S. Korean Munitions Business
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that there were widespread corruption in developing a mobile copter of the south Korean puppet army, according to Yonhap News on July 14.
					 According to the investigation results, those related to the development of the copter made a big profit from setting the development investment higher.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association posted on its website President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Resolutely Repel the U.S. Imperialists' Armed Invasion" on July 10 to mark the 64th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The work, published on July 8, Juche 39 (1950), indicates the tasks for dealing deadly strike at the U.S. imperialist aggressors.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in various countries on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.
					 The seminars were held in Russia, Germany, Sweden and Nepal between July 5 and 7.
					
					 The chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia introduced the brief history of revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, noting that the Korean people have dynamically advanced along the road of its development, smashing all sorts of challenges of the hostile forces under the banner of the Juche idea fathered by him.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and the chairman of the Dresden Group for the Study of the Juche Idea stressed that Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, wisely led the socialist construction and made a great contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the august name of Kim Il Sung would be always kept in the mind of all people.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man recognized and ardently admired by the world.
					
					 Messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars in Germany, Sweden and Nepal.

articles.title: Marshal Kim Jong Un Praised in Switzerland
articles.content:
Marshal Kim Jong Un Praised in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un who is identical to the great leaders is another Songun brilliant commander possessed of iron will and outstanding strategy.
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement made public on July 12 to mark the fifth anniversary of conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on Kim Jong Un is an expression of the Korean party, army and people's reverence and trust in him.
					
					 The DPRK, a nuclear power possessed of H-bomb, recently conducted the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 capable of hitting the U.S. mainland under his guidance.
					
					 Thus, Juche Korea, Songun Korea, passed the final gate to rounding off the national nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S., which had posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK for decades, completely bit the dust.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK having Marshal Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the Party, state and army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Outlook on Posterity Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Outlook on Posterity Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian internet homepage Patrioti Moskva posted a special article titled "Future of Korea" illustrated with a photo of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on July 13 to mark the fifth anniversary of conferment of the title of the DPRK Marshal on him.
					 Saying that everyone would mention Comrade Kim Jong Un of Korea when asked who has drawn the keenest attention from the international community today, the article went on:
					
					 He mixes with the people in extremely modest and broad minded character, and this humane gesture makes people feel tender-hearted and everyone is charmed.
					
					 What touches people is his special loving care for the rising generation.
					
					 Citing detailed facts to show his noble outlook on posterity, the article further said:
					
					 Children are flowers and future of a country and nation and the politics on younger generation holds sway over ups and downs of the country.
					
					 It is by no means accidential that socialist Korea has always emerged victorious, standing unfazed despite grim tempests of history.
					
					 The international community sees the rosy future of Korea in the looks of Kim Jong Un taking warm care of the children.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization on Division of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization on Division of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued an information bulletin on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Solidarity month with the Korean people" disclosed that the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the DPRK by mobilizing huge aggression forces with the wild ambition for dominating the whole of Korea.
					
					 Citing data to prove that with his unique military war methods and outstanding commanding art, President Kim Il Sung frustrated the enemies' numerical and technical superiority by means of the ideological and tactical superiority and shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists in the three year-long Fatherland Liberation War, it said:
					
					 After World War II many countries gained the independence but the Korean people who have lived as a homogeneous nation are still suffering from the tragedy of division.
					
					 South Korea is getting hell-bent on war games, engaging itself in confrontation with the fellow countrymen while following the foreign forces. This is just what foreign forces want.
					
					 The outside forces still control south Korea.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Supported in Britain
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for Reunification Supported in Britain
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The British Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification of the Korean Peninsula made public a statement on July 4, the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement.
					 The statement noted that President Kim Il Sung wisely led the movement for national reunification with his broad magnanimity and noble love for the nation, saying that the July 4 joint statement is a fruition borne of his idea of national reunification.
					
					 Disclosing that the south Korean puppet authorities denied the joint statement and have been engaged in the confrontation with the fellow countrymen while toeing the U.S. line, it said:
					
					 The fundamental principles of Korea's reunification set forth in the joint statement are comprehensively reflected in the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle to achieve the independent reunification of the country, rejecting foreign interference.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana califica "sancion" de EE.UU. de acto inhumanitario e inculto
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana califica "sancion" de EE.UU. de acto inhumanitario e inculto
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- El ministro de Deportes y jefe de la delegacion de la RPDC pronuncio un discurso en la 6a reunion de ministros de deportes, efectuada desde el dia 13 hasta el 15 en Rusia.
					  Convertir el pais en una potencia deportiva y civilizada al fomentar la constitucion fisica del pueblo y desarrollar el deporte nacional, esto es la politica del gobierno de la RPDC y la aspiracion de nuestro pueblo, comenzo el y continuo:
					
					  En los ultimos anos, las actividades deportivas en la RPDC afrontan dificultades debido a las injustas medidas de sancion de la ONU, inventadas por EE.UU.
					
					  Desde 2006, EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles vienen fabricando numerosas e ilegales "resoluciones de sancion" en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU pretextando el problema nuclear.
					
					  En marzo de 2016 aprobaron por la fuerza la "resolucion" No. 2270 en cuya lista de renglones prohibidos se incluyeron los articulos de lujo y hasta los aparatos deportivos de uso masivo.
					
					  Bajo el pretexto de implementar las "resoluciones de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad, algunos paises no permiten vender a la RPDC el esqui, el palo del jugador del hockey sobre hielo, los zapatos de alpinismo, los rifles, cartuchos, arcos y flechas de uso deportivo y otros equipos deportivos ni la salida del pais de los mismos donados por las federaciones deportivas internacionales.
					
					  Ademas, no aprueban la emision de visas a los equipos y delegaciones de deporte de nuestro pais presentando varios pretextos y crean asi obstaculos artificiales en la participacion de nuestro pais en los juegos internacionales y los actos deportivos.
					
					  A traves de tal situacion anormal, el mundo debe conocer bien que la sancion es un acto contra la humanidad y la civilizacion moderna que persigue hacer al mundo retroceder a la edad de oscurantismo.
					
					  El gobierno coreano observara en el futuro tambien la Carta Olimpica y cooperara estrechamente con las organizaciones internacionales y muchos paises del mundo para que las actividades deportivas en la RPDC contribuyan al desarrollo sostenido y la paz del mundo conforme a las declaraciones y resoluciones de las reuniones de ministros de deportes.

articles.title: Ryu Myong Son se reune con el secretario general del partido mozambiqueno
articles.content:
Ryu Myong Son se reune con el secretario general del partido mozambiqueno
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- El subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ryu Myong Son, quien realiza una visita a la Republica de Mozambique en calidad de jefe de la delegacion del PTC, converso con el secretario general del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Mozambique, Eliseu Joaquim Machava.
					El secretario general se refirio a las relaciones de amistad entre dos partidos que tienen larga tradicion historica.
					
					Dijo que el pueblo mozambiqueno no olvida y esta agradecido de la ayuda sincera que ha brindado el Presidente Kim Il Sung a la lucha por la independencia de Mozambique.
					
					Afirmando que triunfara sin falta la causa del PTC guiado por el estimado companero Kim Jong Un, extendio el apoyo total a la lucha del pueblo coreano por defender la soberania del pais.
					
					Recalco que su partido y el pueblo mozambiqueno consolidaran y desarrollaran de continuo las relaciones de amistad entre ambos partidos y paises apreciandolas mucho.

articles.title: Rusia dona alimentos a Corea
articles.content:
Rusia dona alimentos a Corea
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 16 al Puerto de Chongjin los alimentos que dona el gobierno de la Federacion Rusa a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por conducto del Programa Mundial de Alimento.

articles.title: Embajador ruso ofrece encuentro de amistad
articles.content:
Embajador ruso ofrece encuentro de amistad
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 15o aniversario de la historica visita del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a Lejano Oriente de la Federacion Rusa, el embajador ruso en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Alexandr Matsegora, ofrecio el dia 18 un encuentro de amistad, donde fueron invitados los miembros de la cancilleria coreana.
					Los participantes recordaron las hazanas inmortales del Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas en el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-Rusia y charlaron sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad conforme al deseo y la aspiracion comunes de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Ellos realizaron los juegos deportivos.

articles.title: Inaugurada XV Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologias
articles.content:
Inaugurada XV Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologias
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas la XV Exposicion Nacional de Invenciones y Nuevas Tecnologias.
					En la sede se exhiben mas de 1500 inventos y datos de nuevas tecnologias, alcanzados por los cientificos, tecnicos, funcionarios e inventores de todo el pais.
					
					Entre las ponencias, exhibidas por unidad de ministerios, organos centrales y provincias (o ciudades subordinadas directamente al centro) como la ciudad de Pyongyang, hay los logros que contribuiran a la construccion economica y al mejoramiento de la vida popular.
					
					Durante el evento, tendran lugar la exposicion de ciencias y tecnicas, la circulacion de productos intelectuales y otros.
					
					En la ceremonia de inauguracion del dia 18 estuvieron presentes el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Sung Du, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, los funcionarios interesados, etc.
